snippet.title: MLB The Show 24 - Road to The Show Updates
snippet.description:
Big plays. Big decisions. For the first time ever, take control of your career from the MLB® Draft Combine to your final game, in Road to The Show. 

Pre-order MLB The Show 24 now: https://mlbthe.show/563875

Available on 3/19/24

#MLBTheShow #OwnTheShow
